com.mesosphere.sdk.offer.evaluate

Interface OfferEvaluationStage

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ExecutorEvaluationStage, LaunchEvaluationStage, MultiEvaluationStage, NamedVIPEvaluationStage, PlacementRuleEvaluationStage, PortEvaluationStage, ReservationEvaluationStage, ResourceEvaluationStage, VolumeEvaluationStage

    public interface OfferEvaluationStage
    Classes implementing this interface evaluate a pod against an offer and its resources for suitability to run.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      EvaluationOutcome evaluate(MesosResourcePool mesosResourcePool, PodInfoBuilder podInfoBuilder)
      Evaluate the given offer (in the form of a MesosResourcePool, modifying the org.apache.mesos.Protos.TaskInfos and org.apache.mesos.Protos.ExecutorInfo in the given OfferRequirement where appropriate to ensure they have necessary metadata (e.g.

    • Method Detail

      • evaluate

        EvaluationOutcome evaluate(MesosResourcePool mesosResourcePool,
                           PodInfoBuilder podInfoBuilder)
        Evaluate the given offer (in the form of a MesosResourcePool, modifying the org.apache.mesos.Protos.TaskInfos and org.apache.mesos.Protos.ExecutorInfo in the given OfferRequirement where appropriate to ensure they have necessary metadata (e.g. a populated environment variable), deducting used resources from the pool, and creating the appropriate OfferRecommendation in the given OfferRecommendationSlate if relevant.
        Parameters:
        mesosResourcePool - the available resources left available for this stage to consume
        podInfoBuilder - the grouping of all task and executor builders for the pod
        Returns:
        an EvaluationOutcome describing whether this evaluation stage succeeded or failed, and why
